name: Jenny Flight Sim
description:
Flight Simulator game for JN4 biplane (Jenny).  Made with blender game engine, version 2.49b.  Digital assets from "The Movies" by Lionhead (RIP) are used for scenary and terrain.  The airplane model was created by beowulf71.

The blender file used to create the game is included in the package.  

Keypad for flight control:

throttle: kp9 and kp3

pitch: kp8 and kp2

turn: kp6 and kp4

Pan camera left and right with arrow keys.
